prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shell and flippers that is designed to swim gracefully.
I want a fossil Pokemon that resembles a turtle, featuring shades of blue and hints of gray.
Generate an aquatic creature that has a playful personality and a sleek, rounded body shape.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of both prehistoric and modern sea turtles with vibrant colors.
Imagine a small sea Pokemon with a rocky shell and a friendly demeanor, perfect for ocean adventures.
Design a turtle-like Pokemon with smooth curves, a cheerful face, and a blue aquatic theme.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of ancient marine life with distinctive blue tones.
